com.pizza.Model

Class Items

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pizza.CMModel.DBConnect
      • com.pizza.Model.Items

  • public class Items
extends DBConnect

    Models the Items entry of the Items Table

    The Items class is used to model the entries of the items table of the database. In addition to getters and setter of the corresponding fields, there is a method used to store a new entry to the table.
